data.text: @sortius He’s not good at anything he does, even lying, so no

@hotchipsandmayo It really is sad that not only do we think this is possible, but that it's probable 😖

Whoever our next PM is (and I am hoping it's Albo), needs to spend time regaining so much respect for the position of PM
@sortius I wish I could accept the announcement at face value, but it's impossible after all the lies he and the PMO have told.
@littlesteve The question, I suppose, is: do you think he has the skills to ham it up for the cameras?
@LalSiri It's so sad... not just because of how fucked he is, but because Tony Abbott is no longer Australia's worst PM😖
@sortius I was thinking the same, except he was clearly sick and deliberately coughing over the press gallery yesterday

@sortius I was thinking the same!!
Oh the kind of PM we have!

@hotchipsandmayo Hehehe, it does really seem like a Scotty kind of thing to do. The optics of people telling him to "fuck off" while trying to clean up after a flood would absolutely kill his re-election chances
